3.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "What is the worst rom-com of all time", "What is the best animated series of all time", and "Which famous flop should get the deluxe special edition treatment".

10.plot: In the Classic Movie Fight, Host Alicia Malone judges as panelists debate such topics as, "All-Time Best Decade for Movies", "Which Classic Director would have the Best Career today", and "What Classic Movie remains Most Relevant in 2016".

11.title: What is the Best Movie of 1994? - 1994 Movie Fights!
11.plot: Guest Host Joe Starr judges as the panelists debate such topics as, "Best Movie of 1994", "Pitch Speed 2", and "What Character should Jim Carrey play next".

12.title: Best Movie of 2016
12.plot: Panelists Marc Andreyko, Roth Cornet and Scott Mantz debate such topics as, "Best Scene from a Movie in 2016", "Best Performance of 2016", and "Which 2016 Movie should get a "do-over" in 2017".

13.title: Best SNL Movie Star
13.plot: Panelists Joe Starr, Ian Hecox and Jack Henry Robbins debate such topics as, "What movie character would make the best roommate", "Which SNL alumni has had the best movie career", and "What is the best movie with the worst title".

14.title: Ultimate G.I Joe/Transformers Crossover
14.plot: Panelists John Flickinger, Andre Meadows and Matt Iseman debate such topics as, "The Worst M. Night Shymalan Movie", "Pitch a G.I Joe and Transformers Crossover movie", and "Biggest name actor with poorest filmography".

15.title: Worst Performance of 2016 - FAN FIGHTS
15.plot: Three fans come to Movie Fights to debate such topics as, "Best feature film debut of any actor", "Worst performance of 2016", and "What's the worst franchise with five or more films:

16.title: Stoned Fights: Who Should Direct The Batman?
16.plot: In this "Joint Edition" of movie fights, Guest Host Doug Benson judges two teams as they debate such topics as, "Who should direct The Batman", and "Which two celebrities would you like to see become gigantic and fight in a city".

17.title: Who Should Get Their Own LEGO Movie?
17.plot: Panelists JTE, Lon Harris and Billy Business debate such topics as, "Who should be the next character to get their own LEGO movie", "Worst successful director", and "If you could cancel any upcoming sequel, what would it be".

18.title: What Schwarzenegger Character Would Win in a Battle Royale?
18.plot: Panelists Mike Carlson, Even Susser and Van Robichaux debate such topics as, "Greatest all-time movie fist fight", "Which Schwarzenegger character would win in a battle royale", and "Pitch your own Star Wars droid".

19.title: Improve a Movie by Adding Predator
19.plot: Panelists Hal Rudnick, Grae Drake and Jackie Kashian debate such topics as, "Improve any movie by making the villain the Predator", "Best Batman Movie", and "What movie character would you want with you on Purge night".

20.title: Star Wars vs Star Trek
20.plot: John Rocha and Scott Mantz's rivalry comes to a head in this one-on-one, six-round battle where they debate such topics as, "Star Wars vs Star Trek", "Best Ridley Scott Movie" and "Moonlight vs La La Land".

21.title: What Superhero Should Return When They're Old?
21.plot: Panelists Spencer Gilbert, Paul Scheer and Kumail Nanjiani debate such topics as, "Improve a film by adding King Kong", "What actor should return to their Superhero role when they are old", and "What's the nerdiest movie ever".

22.title: Aladdin vs The Little Mermaid vs The Lion King
22.plot: Co-Judge Leonard Maltin helps judge panelists Andre Meadows, Jenny Nicholson and Sarah Sterling as the debate topics such as, "Best Disney Princess", "Best movie from the Disney Renaissance", and "What is the worst Disney song".

23.title: What Superhero Movie Performance Deserves an Oscar?
23.plot: Panelists COy Jandreau, JTE and Hal Rudnick debate such topics as, "What Superhero performance deserved an Oscar", "Greatest Stallone performance", "Who should direct a remake of 'Jaws' (Blind Fight)".

24.title: Who Should Play Joss Whedon's Batgirl: Collider All-Stars
24.plot: In this Last Fighter Standing match the Collider All-Stars go head-to-head and debate such topics as, "Best all-time movie Monster", "Who should play Joss Whedon's Batgirl", and "Movie character you would most want as your boss".

1.title: Biggest Summer Blockbuster of 2017?!
1.plot: Panelists William Bibbiani, Adi Shankar and Brett Erlich debate such topics as, "Biggest Blockbuster of 2017", "Best Movie featuring Morgan Freeman," and "Best Horror Movie reboot".

2.title: Who is the Greatest Director of the 1970's
2.plot: Alicia Malone judges as panelists Dan Murrell, Hal Rudnick and Dave Karger debate such topics as, "Greatest Director of the 1970's", "What movie is the ultimate time capsule", and "Which classic film genre should make a comeback".

3.title: What Avengers Actor Is the Most Replaceable?
3.plot: Panelists Tony Revolori, Gina Ippolito and Baron Vaughn debate the topics, "What Avengers actor is the most replaceable", "What movie is the biggest improvement on its source material", and "What movie would inspire the best theme hotel".

4.title: Who is the Best Car from Cars? - Debut Deathmatch
4.plot: Nine brand-new fighters make their debut and debate such topics as, "Who is the most adorable movie character", "What is the worst X-Men film", and "Best feature debut from a director post-2000".

5.title: Pitch the 1980s Guardians of the Galaxy! - Weird Movie Fights
5.plot: Panelists Joe Starr, Mike Carlson and Scott Aukerman debate such topics as, "Cast the Guardians of the Galaxy if it were made in the 1980's", and "Which movie is most watchable if you replace Daniel Day Lewis with Borat".

6.title: Who's the Best Guardian of the Galaxy?
6.plot: Panelists Coy Jandreau, Matt Key and Markeia McCarty debate issues such as, "Who's the best Guardian of the Galaxy", "Pitch a Guardians spin-off" and "Best us of a song in either Guardians movie".

7.title: Best Nicolas Cage Performance - Cage Match
7.plot: Panelists debate all things Nic Cage with such topics as, "What performance best defines the essence of Nic Cage", "Best Nic Cage one-liner", and "What movie would be most improved by cast Nic Cage as both hero and villain".

8.title: Worst Movie of the Alien Franchise?
8.plot: Panelists Mike Carlson, John Rocha, and Coy Jandreau debate such topics as, "Worst film in the Alien franchise", "Most un-watchable movie of all-time" and "Worst movie poster".

9.title: Best DC Movie?!
9.plot: Panelists Marc Andreyko, DJ Wooldridge and Ashley V. Robinson debate all things DC with topics such as, "Best DC comics movie adaptation", "Worse DC Movie", and "Which movie Batman would win in a fight".

10.title: What Monster Movie Could Save The Mummy's Dark Universe?
10.plot: To see who will challenge the Movie Fights champion for the belt, the panelists must debate such topics as, "Who do you want to join Universal's Dark Universe", "Pitch La La Land 2", and "Choose a new Director for Top Gun 2".

11.title: Who is the Best Pixar Character?
11.plot: Panelists Ed Greer, Perri Nemiroff and Jon Negroni debate all things Pixar with topics as, "Best Pixar character", Best vocal performance in any Pixar movie", and "Best Pixar villain".

12.title: Is Star Wars in Trouble?
12.plot: Panelists Roger Barr, Sasha Perl-Raver and Jay Washington debate such topics as "Is Star Wars in trouble, and how do we fix it", "What's the best Daniel Day Lewis performance", and "What is the best movie of 1992".

13.title: Cast a Live-Action Minions Movie (With Rob Corddry!)
13.plot: Panelists Rob Corddry, Hal Rudnick and Dan Murrell debate such topics as, "Best Time Travel movie with the least realistic depiction of time travel", "Pitch a Ben Affleck sequel" and "What 3 actors should play live-action Minions".

14.title: Best Spider-Man Performance?
14.plot: Panelists Alicia Malone, Jenny Nicholson and Tony Revolori debate such topics as, " Best Spider-Man Performance", "Which movie should get a holiday-themed sequel", and "What unlikely film director should create and direct their own series".

15.title: MOVIE FIGHTS CHAMPIONSHIP! - E.T. vs Jaws
15.plot: In the Championship bout Dan Murrell and Mike Carlson fight for the belt and debate such topics as, "Best Hitchcock Movie", "Pitch a Botanicus solo movie", "Best Movie Trilogy" and "Best Speilberg movie".

16.title: Kevin Smith vs Elijah Wood!
16.plot: Live from San Diego Comic-Con, Dan Murrell challenges both Kevin Smith and Elijah Wood and they debate such topics as, "Greatest living filmmaker", "Scariest movie scene of all time", "What one film should be erased from existence".

17.title: What's Worse Than The Emoji Movie?
17.plot: Panelists Coy Jandreau, Charley Feldman and Spencer Gilbert debate such topics as, "Which actor or actress should a 'Taken'-style franchise", "Pitch a worse movie idea than The Emoji Movie", and "Pitch a title for the next 'Bond' film".

18.title: What Wins: The Force vs The Hulk - Live from Comic-Con 2017
18.plot: In a bracket-style showdown the fighters must debate one-on-one such topics as, "Star Wars prequels or The Hobbit Trilogy", "Worst movie to cosplay as", and "What's more powerful: The Hulk or The Force".

19.title: What Movie Character Would Have the Best Instagram Account?
19.plot: Panelists DJ Wooldridge, Brett Erlich and Darien Sills-Evans, debate such topics as "What Earth-bound franchise should go to space", What movie character would have the best Instagram account", and "Best Comedy of the decade so far".

20.title: Who Should Play The Joker?
20.plot: Panelists Joe Starr, Hal Rudnick and Graham Elwood debate such topics as, "Best overall movie of Summer 2017", "Who should play the next Joker", and "Which or Marvel's Defenders would make the best standalone film".

21.title: Worst Movie of Summer 2017?!
21.plot: Panelists Dan Murrell, Danielle Radford and Marc Andreyko debate such topics as, "Worst movie of Summer 2017", "Best Schwarzenegger comedy of all time", and "What movie character has the best job".

22.title: Who Should Direct Star Wars: Episode 9
22.plot: Panalists Ben Begley, Trisha Hershberger and Mr. Sunday Movies - James Clement debate such topics as, "Who should direct Star Wars: Episode 9", "What's the worst Stephen King adaptation", and "Which movie would be better on mute".

23.title: Which Franchise Would Be Most Improved By Adding Pennywise? - Debut Death Match
23.plot: Nine debut competitors go head-to-head debating such topics as, "What is the worst original movie to get multiple sequels", Which franchise would be improved by adding Pennywise", and "Worst movie to make $1 billion at the box office".

24.title: Marvel Phase 4 Movies We Want to See Most (w/Max Landis)
24.plot: Panelists Max Landis, Roth Cornet and Spencer Gilbert debate such topics as, "Pitch a Marvel Phase 4 Moive", "Improve a movie by turning it into a LEGO movie", and "What movie's characters would you want as your prison gang".

25.title: Best Movie of the 80's!! - 80'S MOVIE FIGHTS!!
25.plot: Panelists Sasha Perl-Raver, Marc Andreyko, and Brianne Chandler debate such topics as, "What 80's movie deserves a sequel", "What was the most influential movie from the 80's" and "Who gave the overall best performance from the 80's".

26.title: Best Harrison Ford Performance?!
26.plot: The panelists, Dan Murrell, JTE, and DJ Wooldridge debate such topics as, "What is Harrison Ford's best performance", "What movie deserves a sequel set in 2049" and "Best movie about surviving in the wilderness", in Andy's final show.

1.title: Best Superhero Movie of 2017?! - SNEAK PEEK
1.plot: In a all-new revamped Movie Fights the two titans, Dan Murrell and Spencer Gilbert, go head-to-head in a preview of the new Movie Fights format.

2.title: Best/Worst Movie of 2017
2.plot: Host Hal Rudnick and Dan Murrell judge contestants Danielle Radford and Joe Starr over such topics as the Best and Worst film of 2017, the Best villain of 2017 and "Who should direct 'Gambit', now that Gore Verbinski left the project?

3.title: How To Kill Movies Forever
3.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges fighters Mike Carlson and Mark Ellis as they debate such topics as "Worst movie to introduce someone to the concept of movies", "Pitch a Fan Edit of a movie you'd like to see" and a Blind Fight.

4.title: The Last Jedi Debate
4.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges fighters Jenny Nicholson and Scott Mantz as they debate such topics as "Star Wars: Last Jedi: Great or not great?", "What was the biggest snub of the 2018 Oscars?" and a Blind Fight.

5.title: What Marvel Villain Needs to Return for a Sequel?
5.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges as the fighters, Ed Greer and Coy Jandreau fight over such topics as, "Which Marvel Villain needs to Return for a Sequel", "What's the Best Football movie" and a Blind Fight.

6.title: The Craziest Star Wars Directors Picks
6.plot: Judge Hal Rudnick oversees fighters Dan Murrell and Rachel Cushing as they debate such topics as "What movie should inspire an anthology series", "Best movie ever that's based on a children's book" and a Blind Fight.

7.title: What is the Best Comic Book Origin Movie?
7.plot: Host Hal Rudnick and The Dans judge fighters DJ Wooldridge and Markia McCarty as they debate such topics as, "Best Comic Book Origin Movie", "Who should be He-Man and Skeletor in the Masters of the Universe reboot" and a Blind Fight.

8.title: What's the Best Sci-Fi Movie of the 21st Century?
8.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges fighters Stacey Howard and Brianne Howard as they debate such topics as, "What's the best sci-fi fim of the 21st century", "Pitch a 2018 film of a musical" and "What 3 MCU ladies should assemble for a team-up film".

9.title: Should Disney Stop Making Star Wars Movies?
9.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges fighters Spencer Gilbert and Ken Napzok as they debate such topics as, "Should Disney stop making Star Wars movies after Episode IX", "What film should win Best Picture", and a Blind Fight.

10.title: What is the Most Badass Movie Scene of All Time?
10.plot: Host Hal Rudnick judges fighters JTE and Jay Washington as they debate such topics as, "Best Fantasy movie aimed at kids", "Most Badass Movie Scene of All Time", and a Blind Fight.

11.title: Is the "Fantastic Beasts" Series a Bad Idea?
11.plot: Hal Rudnick and The Dans judge fighters Lon Harris and William Bibbiani as they debate such topics as, "Is the Fantastic Beasts series a good or bad idea", "Which will be the better DC standalone film: Flash or Aquaman", and a Blind Fight.

12.title: Which Director Will Be The Next Speilberg?
12.plot: Hal Rudnick and The Dans judge the competitors as they debate such topics as, "Which current director is the next Speilberg", "Which character would you play as in The Oasis" and "What Disneyland/World attraction would make the worst ride?"

13.title: What is the Best Science Fiction Movie of All Time?
13.plot: Host Hal Rudnick, with the help of Roth and Dan on the couch, judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Best Sci-Fi film of All-Time", "Best Movie Character to chaperone your kids at prom", and "Best Actor turned Director".

14.title: The Ultimate Star Wars Spin-Off
14.plot: Hal Rudnick and the Dans judge fighters as they debate such topics as, "What Star Wars character deserves a spin-off", "What is the Best Horror Movie in the last 10 years", and "Who should replace Joss Whedon as Batgirl's director"?

15.title: What Will Be the Best Movie of 2018
15.plot: Hal, Lon and Danielle judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What will be the best movie of 2018", "Which classic comedy most deserves a sequel", and "What movie would make the best stage musical".

16.title: Recast the MCU Avengers - Marvel Movie Fights!
16.plot: Hal, Joe and Danielle judge three fighters as they debate such topics as, "Recast the MCU Avengers", "Which Marvel Character should join the Avatar franchise", and "Which franchise should reunite every cast member for one epic movie".

17.title: Movie Fights Extravaganza - Benefit for Women in Film
17.plot: The Movie Fights Extravaganza benefiting Women in Film. From Honest Trailer fights, TV Fights, Anime Fights, Classic Movie Fights, Critic Fights, Collider Fight, Puppet Fight, Mundy Night Raw, Scoops McGee, and a Speed Round Gauntlet.

18.title: Who's The Infinity War MVP?
18.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Who was the Infinity War MVP", "Which band should have its music turned into a big musical", and "Pitch a Fox and Universal crossover".

19.title: Most Disappointing Superhero Sequel Ever?
19.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What's the all-time most disappointing superhero sequel", "What is the best film to win the Palm d'Or at Cannes", and "Best movie about a real or fictional musician".

20.title: Who Should Play Boba Fett in the New Star Wars Spinoff?
20.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate "Who should play Boba Fett in the new Star Wars Spinoff movie", "Who was the best new character in Deadpool 2", and "What's the best movie ever released over Memorial Day Weekend".

21.title: What Should Disney do with Star Wars Now?
21.plot: Host Hal, Dan, and Billy judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What should Disney do with Star Wars now", "What unsuccessful comic book adaptation deserves a second chance," and "What movie MUST be seen on the big screen"

22.title: Honest Trailer Movie Fights
22.plot: Host Hal, Lon, and Danielle judge the Honest Trailer writers as they debate such topics as, "Which movie character would you like as your attorney", "What/Who is the scariest movie ghost", and "Pitch a movie that's set inside the internet".

23.title: Worst Children's Show Host?
23.plot: Hal, Lon and Danielle judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Who would make the worst children's show host", "What movie family should get superpowers", and "What's the most unfairly underrated movie of all time".

24.title: Worst Movie Beloved by Critics?
24.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What is the worst movie that is beloved by critics", "What is the best Will Ferrell movie", and "Pitch an entire amusement park based on any movie".

25.title: Recasting The Watchmen
25.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What is the best performance by an athlete", "Pitch a sequel to a film with a "super" version of a main character", and "Ushing new actors / actresses recast The Watchmen".

26.title: The Great American Movie Fights
26.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such subjects as, "What movie character should replace the Statue of Liberty", "What is the most kick-ass patriotic movie", and "What movie character would throw the best BBQ"

27.title: Which Batman Villain Deserves A Stand-Alone Origin Film?
27.plot: Hal, Lon and Danielle judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "Greatest Slasher franchise", "Who gave the best child-actor performance", and "Which Batman villain deserves a stand-alone origin movie".

1.title: Mission: Impossible vs. Fast and the Furious (SDCC 2018)
1.plot: In this jam-packed Movie Fights at the 2018 San Diego Comic Con, the fighters are paired off tournament style to debate in front of a live audience that chooses the winner.

2.title: Who Should Direct Guardians of the Galaxy 3
2.plot: Joe Starr and the Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "Who should direct Guardians of the Galaxy 3", "What Disney movie should get a "30 years later" sequel", and "Pitch the most unnecessary prequel for any movie".

3.title: Who Should Play Supergirl?
3.plot: Hal, Dan and Lon judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Besides "Jaws" what's the greatest shark movie", "What internet meme deserves its own horror movie", and "Who should play Supergirl".

4.title: Who is the Best Hollywood Chris
4.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "Who is the best Hollywood Chris", "What is the best romantic comedy of all time", "What movie character most deserves to be "Thanos snapped" out of existence"

5.title: Pitch a New Entry in the Air Bud Franchise
5.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Pitch a new entry in the Air Bud franchise", "Cast an already famous animal as James Bond", and a Blind-Fight. Plus Puppies.

6.title: Worst Movie of Summer 2018
6.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What was the worst movie of summer 2018", "Who should direct the new Bond movie", and "Which character's computer would be the best to spy on".

7.title: Movie Fights Title Match
7.plot: With the Movie Fights Belt on the line, the competitors must debate such topics as, "Best live-action film that can be enjoyed by all ages equally", "What movie character would you most want to avenge your death", and a Blind Fight.

8.title: The Best and Worst of DC Movies! DCEU Movie Fights
8.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Which DCEU movie deserves a re-do", "Who gives the best performance in any DC film", and "What DC character would make the best horror film".

9.title: What Marvel Hero Deserves a Streaming Show?
9.plot: Hal, Lon and Danielle judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Which Marvel character without a solo film should get a streaming show", "What's the best scary movie for kids" and "Most improved horror villain if played by Nic Cage"

10.title: Best and Wort of Fall 2018 Predictions
10.plot: Hal, Dan and Ryan judge as the fighters debate, "What will be the best movie of fall 2018," "What will be the biggest disappointment of fall 2018", and "What's the best movie with the worst title".

11.title: 2018 Movies to Remember Come Oscar Time
11.plot: Nine new fighters debate such topics as, "What movie should not be forgotten come Oscar time", "What movie musical should be remade", and "What actress should be the Vin Diesel of a female Fast and Furious".

12.title: How James Gunn Could Fix Suicide Squad
12.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "What major change should James Gunn make to the Suicide Squad?", "Who should play Kraven in a stand-alone movie", and "What's the best biopic of the 21st century"?

13.title: How Should DC Move Justice League Forward
13.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "How should DC move forward with the Justice League", "What's the best movie to inspire the worst franchise" and a Blind Fight.

14.title: The Best of Horror
14.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "What is the best horror movie of the 21st century", "What is the coolest horror movie death of all time", and "What slasher would win in a slasher Battle Royale".

15.title: Who Should Make The Red Dead Redemption Movie?
15.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Who should star and direct a Red Dead Redemption film", "Pick one actor to star in every movie for a year", and "What abandoned film project should have been made".

16.title: Blind Movie Fights
16.plot: Joe, Lon, and Danielle judge as SJ crew does an all Blind Fight.

17.title: Who's The Best Harry Potter Character?
17.plot: Hal, Billy and Danielle judge as the fighters debate such topics as "Who's the best Harry Potter character", "What movie should never be remade", and "What's the best movie starring a professional wrestler".

18.title: Honest Trailers Movie Fights: Round 2
18.plot: The Honest Trailer crew debates such topics as, "What classic 80's movie should get a new sequel focused on the main character's kid", "What movie character's house would you most want to go to for Thanksgiving", and a Blind Fight.

19.title: Best Action Movie Character Ever?
19.plot: The fighters debate such topics as, "Best action hero in film history", "What horror franchise should be buried for good", "Pitch a Disney Princess team-up movie", in this Contender Match.

20.title: Should Avengers 4 Even Have a Trailer?
20.plot: The fighters debate such topics as, "Should Avenger 4 even have a trailer", "What movie most deserves the MST3K treatment", and "What Disney live-action film deserves a new sequel"?

21.title: Spider-Verse Movie Fights
21.plot: The fighters debate such topics as, "What is the best performance in a Spider-Man film", "What Spiderverse character should have their own animated feature", and "What character from ANY MOVIE should be the next Spider-Man villain".

22.title: What Movie Should Aquaman Join?
22.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What is the best movie set at sea", "Who is the best sea captain in any movie", and "Which movie would be most improved by adding Jason Momoa's Aquaman to the cast".

23.title: Star Wars vs Marvel vs Lord of the Rings (Franchise Fights!)
23.plot: Hal and The Dans judge the fighters as they debate such questions as, "Which franchise has the best villain", "What franchise has the best action scene", and "What's the most upsetting / tragic death from any franchise"?

24.title: What Will Be The Best Movie of 2019?
24.plot: Hal, Max and Danielle judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "What will be the best film of 2019", "What movie would inspire the most intense escape room experience" and a Blind Fight.

25.title: Who Should Control Sony's "Venom" Franchise?
25.plot: Hal, Lon and Danielle judge the fighters as they debate such topics as, "Who should take control of the "Venom" franchise", "Who should play Ken in the upcoming Barbie adaptation", and "Pitch a present-day follow-up to Space Jam".

26.title: What is the WORST M. Night Shyamalan movie?
26.plot: Hal and The Dans judge as the fighters debate such questions as, "What is the worst M. Night film", "What IP would M. Night be a great fit for", and "What other M. Night movie most deserves a sequel".

27.title: Movie Fights Championship
27.plot: With the Belt on the line, Hal, Danielle and Lon judge as the fighters debate such topics as, "Who is the best actor/actress working today", "What should win Best Picture this year" and "What's the most under-appreciated movie of all time?"

-1.title: Lion King Remake Must Haves?
-1.plot: Panelists Trisha Hershberger, Steve Zaragoza and Lon Harris debate such topics as, "Worst Tim Burton movie", "One thing the live-action Lion King Must Have and Must Avoid", and "What flop deserves a second chance sequel".

imdb.title: Screen Junkies Movie Fights
plot: Real nerds talk real fights about real movies.
